definition: book or record/registry/roll/place of one's family or ancestral records/membership

sentences.english: The complexity of hukou reform daunts Chinese leaders.
sentences.chinese: 户籍改革的艰巨和复杂性让政府踌躇不前。

sentences.english: Household has a separate membership to membership and sub-two.
sentences.chinese: 另立户籍有转籍和分籍两种。

sentences.english: Hukou reform was fine, but the government did not want to be hassled.
sentences.chinese: 户籍改革固然重要，但政府不希望被冒犯。

sentences.english: The picture of hukou reform across China remains mixed.
sentences.chinese: 中国各地的户籍改革状况仍然错综复杂。

sentences.english: The bank suggests that phasing out the household registration system would  encourage more people to move to the city.
sentences.chinese: 世行建议逐步取消户籍制度以鼓励更多人去城市。

sentences.english: Many provinces are also relaxing the hukou household-registration system.
sentences.chinese: 许多省份正在放松户籍制度的限制。

sentences.english: The household registry certificate, one set, issued within the past one month.
sentences.chinese: 四最近一个月内申请之户籍誊本一份。

sentences.english: The koseki is a genealogist's dream.
sentences.chinese: 户籍制不过是系谱专家的一个美好的梦想而已。

sentences.english: The transcript of domiciliary register carrying the same name in case the application is made pursuant to sub-paragraph 3, paragraph 1 .
sentences.chinese: 依第一项第三款规定申请者，为同姓名者之户籍誊本。

sentences.english: In practice, the hukou system is no longer as strictly enforced as before.
sentences.chinese: 实际上，户籍制度已经不像从前那样严苛了。

sentences.english: The department of residence register ought to bear mostly liability in controlling repetition of names.
sentences.chinese: 户籍登记机关在控制重名重姓方面应当负主要责任。

sentences.english: We will carry out reform of the household registration system and relax requirements for household registration in towns and small and medium-sized cities.
sentences.chinese: 推进户籍制度改革，放宽中小城市和小城镇落户条件。

sentences.english: The sources are a product of the Eight Banner registration system.
sentences.chinese: 这些资源是八旗户籍制度的产物。

sentences.english: China to relax "hukou" restrictions in small cities, towns.
sentences.chinese: 我国将放宽中小城市和小城镇户籍限制。

sentences.english: Advance the reform of household registration system.
sentences.chinese: 推进户籍管理制度改革。

definition: population (counted as number of households for census or taxation)/registered residence/residence permit/(in Hong Kong and Macau) bank account
social insurance/abbr. for 社會保險|社会保险
